title: Group portrait of two men and two women standing, including groom in center, wearing dark bow tie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, and bride, wearing earrings, light colored blouse with lace collar, matching light colored jacket and skirt, and corsage on left shoulder, posed in living room interior with Asian landscape patterned curtains, floral rug, and sofa, possibly for wedding on Webster Avenue in the Hill District, horizontal version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
